DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to further access the utility of biochemical and clinical biomarkers for glucocorticoid-mediated anti-inflammatory effects and safety endpoints against which dissociated agonists of the glucocorticoid receptor (DAGR) will be evaluated in adult healthy volunteers.
DOC.brief_title: The Dose Response of Prednisone on Biochemical and Clinical Makers in Adult Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy male or females willing to be confined and comply with scheduled visits Women are to be surgically sterile. History of febrile illness within 5 days prior to the first dose Positive urine drug screen Treatment with an investigational product within 30 days prior to the first dose of study medication
DOC.keyword: Glucocorticoids, Biomarkers, Dissociated Agonist of the Glucocorticoid Receptor
